title: Enhancing Relation Extraction for COVID-19 Vaccine Shot-Adverse Event Associations with Large Language Models
details: Y Li, D Viswaroopan, W He, J Li, X Zuo, H Xu, C Tao - 2025
abstract: Objective The rapid evolution of the COVID-19 virus has led to the development of different vaccine shots, each designed to combat speci c variants and enhance overall e cacy. While vaccines have been crucial in controlling the spread of the …
